name: Easy Smoked Sausage Skillet
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: Dinner's on the table in no time with this one-skillet sausage and veggie dish served over rice.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage, diagonally cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 large red bell pepper, sliced thin
½ cup chicken broth or water
directions: Heat olive oil and crushed garlic, stir in smoked sausage slices and cook until smoked sausage is browned
Add pepper, onion, broccoli, chicken broth and tomato sauce and simmer for about 10 minutes until vegetables are tender and the liquid is absorbed
In the meantime, cook rice according to package instructions
Stir rice into the skillet, sprinkle with cheese and serve
